## Basic statistics

```{r}
#' Title
#'
#' @param data 
#'
#' @return A data.frame/tibble.
#'
descriptive_stats <- function(data) {
    data %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(metabolite) %>%
    dplyr::summarise(dplyr::across(
      value,
      base::list(
        mean = mean,
        sd = sd
      )
    )) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(dplyr::across(
      dplyr::where(is.numeric),
      ~ base::round(.x, digits = 1)
    ))
}
```
